name: Ho Kok Sun Colorectal: Piles & Colon Surgeon

reviews.text: Thank you Dr Ho for the fistula surgery. I couldn’t be more grateful for the professionalism I received. Dr Ho made me feel at ease and explained everything clearly. The surgery went smoothly, and my recovery has been quick thanks to his expertise. His team was also kind, responsive, and supportive throughout the whole process.

I would like to thank the doctor ho, for the minor piles ligation he performed for me 2 years ago. Up till now, I have not experienced much bleeding, and the quality of life have significantly improved. Once again thank you,

Alvin O.

I just did my piles surgery 4 days ago. And I’m in healing process. Today I feel 95% better. Thank you Dr Ho Kok Sun so much for doing such a great job on my surgery. I'm feeling better every day. You have no idea how grateful I am for everything you've done for me. I really appreciate all your hard work. God bless!  Fiona.

Dr Ho is one of the most skilful, knowledgeable, caring and helpful specialists I’ve ever come across. So far, I have seen many specialists and some I’ve met are quite skilful as well, but they are more business oriented. Dr Ho will try to explain what is causing your issues and will put your worries to rest. He still drops by my ward and see how I am doing so far and explain the findings and what I should do and eat to rectify the issues. Thanks to Dr Ho for performing my colonoscopy and I will definitely recommend any friends, relatives or colleagues whom might need his expertise.

I would like to thank Dr Ho for solving my piles issues. He was the 3rd opinion I sought before I was convinced that his treatment method is most suitable for my case. The only post treatment issue I have is 1) wound infection 2) bleeding post treatment. 5 months post treat I no longer have that issue.

Alvin
